result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Exposing Genitals/Pubic Area/Intimate Parts to a Child

records.addlTxt:
Defendant William M Montgomery appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for status of counsel. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for casue to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing. Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 08:15 am.
OSPD APPOINTMENT OF COUNSEL REPORT. Received and Filed. nk

Defendant William M Montgomery not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for status of counsel. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for status of counsel in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility. Status conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant William M Montgomery not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. SPD failed to appoint counsel. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of Counsel.
Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
No Contact Order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MM (11/15/05) Valarie N, Kathryn T, Mishes Place, AmStar Gas Station, Premier Express Laundry

Defendant William M Montgomery in court with attorney Joan Elizabeth Zawikowski.  Defendant William M Montgomery in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  William M Montgomery appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
